definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The navigation rules and tonnage regulation of Panama Canal.
sentences.chinese: 巴拿马运河的航行和吨位规定。

sentences.english: Black vitreous enamel plant production, has received medals of Panama International Fair.
sentences.chinese: 该厂产的黑釉瓷，曾获得巴拿马国际博览会奖章。

sentences.english: Colombian officials were arrested quickly. Then Amador made a speech.
sentences.chinese: 哥伦比亚在巴拿马的官员很快就被捕了。

sentences.english: Many people are asking what is behind the Panama papers.
sentences.chinese: 许多人在问巴拿马文件的幕后动机。

sentences.english: He’s at school right now. The Technological University of Panama.
sentences.chinese: 他这会儿在学校，巴拿马科技大学。

sentences.english: The Panama Canal opened almost one hundred years ago.
sentences.chinese: 巴拿马运河开通于近100年前。

sentences.english: Kuna who live on mainland Panama, though, don’t drink the cocoa.
sentences.chinese: 但是生活在巴拿马主岛的库那族居民并不喝可可饮料。

sentences.english: In 1879 de Lesseps tried to recreate his success in Panama.
sentences.chinese: 1879年，雷赛布试图在巴拿马再造辉煌。

sentences.english: Also in Fifteen-Thirteen, Vasco Nunez de Balboa crossed the Isthmus of Panama and reached the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 同年，巴尔沃亚跨过了巴拿马地峡到达了太平洋。

sentences.english: Illegal firearms are displayed before being destroyed in Panama City.
sentences.chinese: 巴拿马城，非法枪支在销毁之前被摆在地上。

sentences.english: The name Sona does refer to the prison in Panama.
sentences.chinese: 的确是指巴拿马的监狱。

sentences.english: Alajuela is one of two artificial lakes linked to the Panama Canal (not  pictured).
sentences.chinese: 阿拉胡埃拉湖是连接着巴拿马运河的两个人工河之一。

sentences.english: He was raised on the mean streets of the central market district of Panama City.
sentences.chinese: 他从小在巴拿马城中心闹市区的穷街陋巷里长大。

sentences.english: Loading of the Panamax and larger sized ships will contribute to increased efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 巴拿马型及更大型远洋船舶的装运将促进效率的提高。
